=================================
Computational Chemistry Utilities
=================================

Computational Chemistry Utilities (``ccu``) provides useful
classes and functions for common workflows in computational
chemistry with a focus on computational catalysis.

``ccu`` requires: Python 3.10+.

**PyPI package name**: comp-chem-utils_

Features
---------

``ccu``
provides tools for adsorption studies,

|cu-bhs-top| |cu-bhs-side|

free energy diagrams,

.. image:: /images/fancyplots_fed.png
   :align: center

thermodynamic property calculations,

.. image:: /images/chempot.gif
   :align: center

and more.

Documentation
--------------

* :doc:`/get_started`: install and start using `ccu`

* :doc:`/user_guide/howtos/index`: step-by-step guides for how to use `ccu`\ s
  features

* :doc:`/user_guide/tutorials/index`: hands-on lessons to develop familiarity with
  `ccu`

* :doc:`/user_guide/reference/index`: package index, CLI command help, `ccu`
  configuration

* :doc:`/user_guide/explanation/index`: discussion of key topics
